phrases: You are not going to regret this later, are you?
With that, the contract is complete.
I would heard rumors, but I have never seen one before.
There are things that are neither human nor inanimate.
They are different from the ones that I always see.
I never knew things like this existed.
I just want somewhere to go home to.
This is the product you have all been waiting for.
A rare item, even among our current offerings.
I thought he hated being around people.
I will make you my apprentice.
What is the deal with that creep?
We will be receiving five million pounds.
Who is he, to want to spend so much money on me?
She is docile, so she should be easy to discipline.
I never thought I would see you at this auction.
However, we must ask you to follow the rules.
Please do not wander onto the stage
I do not need your lecturing nor small talk.
You do not need to keep your head down.
I will be borrowing your lobby.
He is neither a conman nor a sorcerer.
He is the real deal, a rarity in recent times.
I cannot believe we let him have that.
You are the only one here with me.
Nice to meet you, my puppy.
It appears that you possess the sight.
She is too much of a burden to take in.
What would people think if we gave her to an orphanage, though?
I have never once been fortunate!
Then let us see to it that you feel fortunate someday.
I cannot have you being so helpless.
Dolls are fine, but I paid good money for you.
You need to make yourself worth looking at.
Now, close your eyes and stand close to me.
Thoroughly entangle the branches as a spider's web.
You can open your eyes now.
we made it in one leap.
It is also your home, as of today.
How did we get here from inside the building?
A rural area on the outskirts of England.
And what am I an apprentice of?
You will not need that anymore.
You have become a mage's apprentice.
We are an endangered, old-fashioned kind, mind you.
I know how to take a bath.
You do not know how to use it, do you?
Besides, you are filthy, so I will wash you.
You need to soak to your shoulders, or you will never be warm.
Come out when you are warm.
I did not think I would ever get a proper bath again.
If you ever feel like giving up on life,
why do not you try giving yourself to someone who wants you?
Well, well, I thought I smelled something delicious.
It is an adorable human girl.
I suppose we would be fairies, in human terms.
You better not use such unrefined words for us, though.
Hey, you are a Sleigh Beggy, are not you?
The Thorn Mage is so silly, taking in a Sleigh Beggy as his apprentice.
Honey wine, more valuable than gold coins of ancient times,
more precious than any flower of the land of fairies.
If you are going to become a mage, we will give you all the help you need, my beloved.
so you do not need to come in.
Have something to eat and drink so you can relax.
You look like you have a lot of questions.
I will try to answer your questions.
It will be like a bedtime story.
They are attracted to anything new.
Is it true that you are a mage?
If I had to choose a word, a queen bee.
are capable of attracting and binding all manner of things.
They are worker bees that are drawn to you whether the queen bee can see them or not.
Even if she cannot see them?
It seems you can see them, but that is not common among your kind.
They bring fortune and misfortune upon the queen bee.
Their kindness and favors do not necessarily benefit a human.
However, to be loved by them means that you will never be without assistance.
You need their help to do magic, so it is an important trait to have.
You will surely become a great mage.
That does not mean I will be ordering you around, though.
But I do not have any right to refuse, do I?
You are free to reconsider, though.
Becoming a mage is just one path of countless many.
You are like family to me now.
The hole formed naturally at the bottom of a river.
so you should turn in for the day.
Would you please show her to her room?
I even get a proper place to sleep.
Is it the scent of grass?
Hey, why do not we go for a midnight walk?
There is a nice forest nearby.
Come on, it will be fine!
Take a walk, tire yourself out a little and sleep well.
Well, it will make for a good lesson.
It is the trail we leave after we have passed by.
You can see that, too, huh?
Hey, Chise, what is your family like?
I was taken in by a lot of different relatives.
I might not have come here if I would come to love them.
Hey, we have walked pretty far.
We got to go even further, if anything.
After all, you do not need to go back anymore.
We finally duped the Thorn Mage.
I need to take you back to our land, or the others will get angry at me.
It will be a lot easier than living in the human world.
Hey, it just happens to be open.
The Fairy Kingdom is past here.
A super fun world, just for you and us.
You do not even have family waiting for you.
You might as well live a happy, giddy life on this side.
There is no reason you have to go back to that house.
No one ever told me that I could be there.
Even if I am just a toy,
even if he will throw me out when he is bored of me,
he told me I was family, even if it was just that once.
It looks like my puppy has already learned where her den is.
How did you know where we were?
She has a collar and a bell.
I will forgive you just this once.
Next time, you will be salamander food.
Let us see if a half-baked loser like you can protect our robin.
You do not need to remind me.
You can change your mind whenever you want, Chise.
That was a good experience, was it not?
Many of them make a habit of seducing us with sweet words.
No, I should have told you right away.
That is my duty to you, after all.
But it seems like he is tense
It is easy to get lost in the forest at night.
Let us go home like this.
We will need to fix up your arm when we get home.
I cannot have my future wife be scarred.
Oh, have I not told you yet?
I bought you to be my apprentice, of course,
but I also hope to make you my bride.
Shall we prepare for our honeymoon?
A girl, departing for London with a sorcerer.
The world offers a kind hand to a lonely girl, but...
